dooyit.storage

Class TaskSaver

  • java.lang.Object
    • dooyit.storage.Saver<TaskData>
      • dooyit.storage.TaskSaver

  • public class TaskSaver
extends Saver<TaskData>
    The TaskSaver class contains methods and attributes necessary for saving tasks.
    Author:
    Dex

      • save

        boolean save(java.util.ArrayList<TaskData> tasks)
      throws java.io.IOException
        Creates the directories if necessary before saving the list of tasks.
        Specified by:
        save in class Saver<TaskData>
        Parameters:
        tasks - An ArrayList of TaskData to be saved
        Returns:
        Returns true if save is successful, otherwise returns false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the saved file cannot be written or failure to create save file

      • saveToFile

        private boolean saveToFile(java.io.File file,
                           java.util.ArrayList<TaskData> tasks)
                    throws java.io.IOException
        Writes the list of TaskData into the File specified. A backup is also saved when count exceeds the limit.
        Parameters:
        file - The File specified by the filePath
        tasks - The list of TaskData
        Returns:
        Returns true if the save is successful, otherwise returns false
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If unable to write to save file.

        Parameters:

        Throws:
